items.title: Why everyone in AI is freaking out about DeepSeek
items.description: DeepSeek has a free website and mobile app even for U.S. users with an R1-powered chatbot interface similar to OpenAI's ChatGPT.

items.title: Trump’s $500 billion AI moonshot: Ambition meets controversy in ‘Project Stargate’
items.description: Trump unveils ambitious $500 billion 'Project Stargate' AI initiative with tech giants OpenAI, Oracle, and SoftBank, sparking controversy as Elon Musk...

items.title: No retraining needed: Sakana’s new AI model changes how machines learn
items.description: Sakana found that self-adaptive models can modify their weights during inference to adjust behavior to new and unseen tasks.

items.title: Capcom testing generative AI to manage “tens of thousands of ideas”
items.description: The developers of games like Street Fighter are using generative AI to take the busywork out of development.

items.title: Hugging Face shrinks AI vision models to phone-friendly size, slashing computing costs
items.description: Hugging Face's new SmolVLM models run on smartphones, outperform larger systems and slash computing costs by 300X.
